meanings.definition: To use excessively or too much.
meanings.sent1: She overuses her phone by constantly texting her friends.
meanings.sent2: He overuses his computer for work every day.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overuses its energy gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The car overuses its gas on long road trips.
meanings.sent5: The teacher overuses her red pen for grading papers.

meanings.definition: The act of using something excessively.
meanings.sent1: His overuses of the printer led to high printing costs.
meanings.sent2: The overuses of social media can impact mental health.
meanings.sent3: The overuses of glitter in the craft project made it sparkle too much.
meanings.sent4: The overuses of sugar in the recipe made the dessert too sweet.
meanings.sent5: The overuses of water in the garden caused flooding.
